programme.title: Kessler's Lab
programme.desc: When a secret drug trial using human clones must come to an end, a conflicted psychologist risks everything to stop a deranged doctor and save the clones before it's too late.

programme.title: Leave
programme.desc: Henry Harper is a successful novelist who has it all. But after surviving a recent trauma he finds himself haunted by a dream that terrifies him. Convinced that the only way to understand what the dream means is to write his way through it. Starring Rick Gomez, Frank John Hughes, Vinessa Shaw

programme.title: Les Formidables
programme.desc: Inspector Sung-woo gets lambasted at work when his partner gets killed during a routine stakeout. Knowing he’s doomed, Su-hyun escapes right under the nose of massive security. In the process, he kidnaps the hapless Sung-woo, leading to the most outlandish test of wills and survival. Starring Joong-Hoon Park, Jeong-myeong Cheon, In-yeong Yu

programme.title: Life Tastes Good
programme.desc: A quirky tale that brings together a murder, poison mushrooms and a mysterious woman to reveal the ephemeral beauty of life and the unforgiving nature of death.

programme.title: Love Meet Hope
programme.desc: A grandfather's love stories enlighten a jaded man and a moonstruck girl about the realities of love. Starring Amanda Markowitz, Bradley Fowler, Ed Asner

programme.title: Love Simple
programme.desc: Adam and Seta fall in love in a Brooklyn laundromat, but they’ve each got a secret and it’s a full-time job to keep they’re lies straight.

programme.title: Magic Boys
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder, a hapless pair of misfits escape their own near death experience by posing as male strippers - only to find themselves neck deep in even bigger trouble. Starring Vinnie Jones, Michael Madsen, Tamer Hassan

programme.desc: 24 Hour Free Movies brings you a growing collection of popular movies and TV shows from around the world. Always Free & Always Fun
